CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management: New retention actions in Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: We will release additional retention actions as part of the Power Automate integration with Microsoft Purview Records Management. You can now relabel a file or an email at the end of its retention period or apply a retention label to a file in SharePoint. You can also delete items in SharePoint, OneDrive, or Exchange with all executed retention actions recorded in the Microsoft Purview Audit log.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management: New retention actions in Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: We will release additional retention actions as part of the Power Automate integration with Microsoft Purview Records Management. You can now relabel a file or an email at the end of its retention period or apply a retention label to a file in SharePoint. You can also delete items in SharePoint, OneDrive, or Exchange with all executed retention actions recorded in the Microsoft Purview Audit log.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Power Automate workflow when the item reaches the end of its retention period. For example, execute a complex disposition approval process or move the file to an archive.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Initiate a Power Automate workflow when the item reaches the end of its retention period. For example, execute a complex disposition approval process or move the file to an archive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - OCR support in Insider Risk Management
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Insider Risk Management will support the scanning technique of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to detect potentially risky activities that may lead to data security incidents related to images in SharePoint, Teams messages, and endpoints. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The launch dates were incorrect and have now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Note: The launch state was incorrect and has now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - OCR support in Insider Risk Management
OldVersion.description: With this update, Insider Risk Management will support the scanning technique of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to detect potentially risky activities that may lead to data security incidents related to images in SharePoint, Teams messages, and endpoints. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The launch dates were incorrect and have now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Note: The launch state was incorrect and has now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Real-time policy tuning analysis
CurrentVersion.description:
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction based on the number of users that could match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Real-time policy tuning analysis
OldVersion.description:
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction based on the number of users that could match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect managerial harassment
CurrentVersion.description: By combining Communication Compliance classifiers with Microsoft Entra ID organizational hierarchy data, customers will be able to monitor offensive/inappropriate communications are occurring in a hierarchical imbalance, where customers may wish to explore potential root causes of conflict in their respective organizations.  This feature is currently in back under review and not being scheduled at this time.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect managerial harassment
OldVersion.description: By combining Communication Compliance classifiers with Azure Active Directory organizational hierarchy data, we are able to detect if offensive/inappropriate communications are occurring in a hierarchical imbalance.   Timing: Rollout to public preview will begin in the middle of September and end in October.  What you need to do to prepare: No action needed at this time.   Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Potential high impact user experience enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: We will make some minor experience changes for when a user has been detected as a potential high impact user whose activities may lead to potential data security incidents. These changes will include improving accessibility and providing more prominent highlighting of the reasons for being detected as a potential high impact user. Additionally, we will provide additional descriptors regarding how the risk score booster is applied to the user. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

These changes will include improving accessibility and providing more prominent highlighting of the reasons for being detected as a potential high impact user. Additionally, we will provide additional descriptors regarding how the risk score booster is applied to the user. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
OldVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
OldVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business Opens in-app for Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Previously, the OneDrive button in Outlook opened a new tab for OneDrive; with this change, you will see OneDrive inline for a consistent and fast experience.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business Opens in-app for Outlook on the web
OldVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Previously, the OneDrive button in Outlook opened a new tab for OneDrive; with this change, you will see OneDrive inline for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Use sensitivity labels in Microsoft 365 apps when connected experiences are disabled
CurrentVersion.description: Your organization can now disable connected experiences for privacy concerns without impacting data security policies, such as sensitivity labels. Services associated with Microsoft Purview (e.g. sensitivity labels and rights management) are no longer controlled by policy settings to manage privacy controls for Microsoft 365 Apps. Instead, these services will rely on their existing security admin controls in Purview portals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Supports live data sync to Excel
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Forms supports quickly and easily syncing form responses to an Excel file. Now you’ll always have the latest information, updated automatically, so you can leverage the full range of Excel functions to analyze your data and collab with your peers.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Supports live data sync to Excel
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Forms supports quickly and easily syncing form responses to an Excel file. Now you’ll always have the latest information, updated automatically, so you can leverage the full range of Excel functions to analyze your data and collab with your peers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
OldVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: The new Queues app is a solution for collaboratively handling customer calls natively in Teams. Starting with surfacing call queue calls, your team members can use the Queues app to handle inbound calls, be it PSTN or VOIP. They can make outbound calls on behalf of the call queues or auto attendant that they are assigned to. And they can review the call queue statistics and seamlessly collaborate with their lead and colleagues within the flow of work. Authorized users, with permissions from Teams admins, can monitor their call queues and auto attendants in realtime, generate reports on queue and agent performance, configure their call queues and auto attendants using Teams settings, and opt in or out their team members to optimize for business needs. This is a Teams Premium feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app (Premium)
OldVersion.description: The new Queues app is a solution for collaboratively handling customer calls natively in Teams. Starting with surfacing call queue calls, your team members can use the Queues app to handle inbound calls, be it PSTN or VOIP. They can make outbound calls on behalf of the call queues or auto attendant that they are assigned to. And they can review the call queue statistics and seamlessly collaborate with their lead and colleagues within the flow of work. Authorized users, with permissions from Teams admins, can monitor their call queues and auto attendants in realtime, generate reports on queue and agent performance, configure their call queues and auto attendants using Teams settings, and opt in or out their team members to optimize for business needs. This is a Teams Premium feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Cloud egress groups (macOS)
CurrentVersion.description: Restrict sensitive files that match your policies from being shared with unrestricted cloud service domains. Restrict the use of specified web browsers, identified by their executable names. The specified browsers are blocked from accessing files that match the conditions of an enforced a DLP policy where the upload-to-cloud services restriction is set to block or block override.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Cloud egress groups (macOS)
OldVersion.description: Restrict sensitive files that match your policies from being shared with unrestricted cloud service domains. Restrict the use of specified web browsers, identified by their executable names. The specified browsers are blocked from accessing files that match the conditions of an enforced a DLP policy where the upload-to-cloud services restriction is set to block or block override.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Revamped Resources on mobile and tablet
CurrentVersion.description: The Resources section on Viva Connections mobile and tablet will show content from the recently revamped Resources section on Viva Connections desktop.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Revamped Resources on mobile and tablet
OldVersion.description: The Resources section on Viva Connections mobile and tablet will show content from the recently revamped Resources section on Viva Connections desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can help you create draft quizzes
CurrentVersion.description: To help teachers, staff, and information workers save time, Copilot in Forms can now generate ice breakers, fun trivia, quizzes, and assessments with correct answers, which helps users focus more on engagement and interaction with their audience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can help you create draft quizzes
OldVersion.description: To help teachers, staff, and information workers save time, Copilot in Forms can now generate ice breakers, fun trivia, quizzes, and assessments with correct answers, which helps users focus more on engagement and interaction with their audience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can generate quizzes from provided materials
CurrentVersion.description: Generating quizzes from provided materials is one of the most commonly requested features in the education industry, and it is now available in Forms. To save time, users can create quizzes from documents, textbooks, or notes using Copilot. Copilot can create draft quizzes based on the provided materials and users' prompts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can generate quizzes from provided materials
OldVersion.description: Generating quizzes from provided materials is one of the most commonly requested features in the education industry, and it is now available in Forms. To save time, users can create quizzes from documents, textbooks, or notes using Copilot. Copilot can create draft quizzes based on the provided materials and users' prompts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals Graph API's
CurrentVersion.description: The Approvals Graph APIs allows developers to create and manage Approvals from any application. This set of APIs allows users to integrate Approvals with line of business application and automate creation and updates of approvals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals Graph API's
OldVersion.description: The Approvals Graph APIs allows developers to create and manage Approvals from any application. This set of APIs allows users to integrate Approvals with line of business application and automate creation and updates of approvals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: View only mode in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Engage admins will have the ability to change users' access to view only mode. In view only mode, users can access and view content in Engage, but cannot comment, react, or create new posts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: View only mode in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: Engage admins will have the ability to change users' access to view only mode. In view only mode, users can access and view content in Engage, but cannot comment, react, or create new posts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Teams Q&A to collect attendee questions in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Q&A enhances meeting and webinar participation for attendees by allowing participants to submit questions and engage in discussions. Organizers can moderate the Q&A feed, highlight important questions, and provide live answers. This feature is ideal for structured meetings and events, promoting an interactive and inclusive environment.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Teams Q&A to collect attendee questions in GCC
OldVersion.description: Teams Q&A enhances meeting and webinar participation for attendees by allowing participants to submit questions and engage in discussions. Organizers can moderate the Q&A feed, highlight important questions, and provide live answers. This feature is ideal for structured meetings and events, promoting an interactive and inclusive environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage change log for leaders and audiences identified
CurrentVersion.description: Admins and corporate communicators will be able to see any leaders who were added or removed in Viva Engage, as well as any audiences and removed from a leader in Viva Engage.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage change log for leaders and audiences identified
OldVersion.description: Admins and corporate communicators will be able to see any leaders who were added or removed in Viva Engage, as well as any audiences and removed from a leader in Viva Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Compliance boundary cmdlet tool for managing compliance boundary property
CurrentVersion.description: This cmdlet allows users to verify the compliance boundary property of a specific OneDrive site, ensuring that the value is correctly configured. If the property is not set or if the site is in arbitration, users can use this cmdlet to assign the property value for the site for compliance boundary to take effect.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Compliance boundary cmdlet tool for managing compliance boundary property
OldVersion.description: This cmdlet allows users to verify the compliance boundary property of a specific OneDrive site, ensuring that the value is correctly configured. If the property is not set or if the site is in arbitration, users can use this cmdlet to assign the property value for the site for compliance boundary to take effect.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voting, Filtering, Sorting, and Archiving Questions now available in the Q&A App on Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Take your Q&A to the next level with this new update that lets attendees vote on the questions they want presenters to answer. Organizers can sort questions by most voted, filter, and archive questions to keep the discussion focused in meetings and events.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voting, Filtering, Sorting, and Archiving Questions now available in the Q&A App on Teams
OldVersion.description: Take your Q&A to the next level with this new update that lets attendees vote on the questions they want presenters to answer. Organizers can sort questions by most voted, filter, and archive questions to keep the discussion focused in meetings and events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams premium feature usage report for administrators in Teams admin center (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Premium feature usage report in the Microsoft Teams admin center (TAC) will help administrators understand the usage of various Teams Premium features across users in their organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams premium feature usage report for administrators in Teams admin center (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Teams Premium feature usage report in the Microsoft Teams admin center (TAC) will help administrators understand the usage of various Teams Premium features across users in their organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights Copilot Dashboard delegation
CurrentVersion.description: Users can delegate access to the Copilot Dashboard to others within their company. Admins can set policies to manage access to the delegation feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights Copilot Dashboard delegation
OldVersion.description: Users can delegate access to the Copilot Dashboard to others within their company. Admins can set policies to manage access to the delegation feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Turn On/Off notifications for a post
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to opt in/opt-out from receiving notifications for a post in a channel.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Turn On/Off notifications for a post
OldVersion.description: Users will now be able to opt in/opt-out from receiving notifications for a post in a channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Sensitivity label support for town hall and webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will now allow event organizers to set sensitivity labels for town halls and webinars. These labels are visible to organizers when creating an event instance once selected, and notify organizers if the details of the event being created are not valid for the selected sensitivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: External presenters can join on mobile
CurrentVersion.description: This update allows presenters who were invited using the external presenter feature to join via their Android and iOS Teams client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Bulk upload for Priority User Groups
CurrentVersion.description: Insider Risk Management Priority user groups will now support bulk upload capabilities.  An IRM administrator will be able to upload a CSV of UPNs that they would like to add to a new or existing priority user group. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. The alert will be reviewed by a policy investigator, who is explicitly granted permission to review policy alerts by the Communication Compliance admin role. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-investigate-remediate?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.description:

The alert will be reviewed by a policy investigator, who is explicitly granted permission to review policy alerts by the Communication Compliance admin role. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-investigate-remediate?view=o365-worldwide

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business Opens in-app for Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Previously, the OneDrive button in Outlook opened a new tab for OneDrive; with this change, you will see OneDrive inline for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Use sensitivity labels in Microsoft 365 apps when connected experiences are disabled
CurrentVersion.description: Your organization can now disable connected experiences for privacy concerns without impacting data security policies, such as sensitivity labels. Services associated with Microsoft Purview (e.g. sensitivity labels and rights management) are no longer controlled by policy settings to manage privacy controls for Microsoft 365 Apps. Instead, these services will rely on their existing security admin controls in Purview portals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Supports live data sync to Excel
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Forms supports quickly and easily syncing form responses to an Excel file. Now you’ll always have the latest information, updated automatically, so you can leverage the full range of Excel functions to analyze your data and collab with your peers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: The new Queues app is a solution for collaboratively handling customer calls natively in Teams. Starting with surfacing call queue calls, your team members can use the Queues app to handle inbound calls, be it PSTN or VOIP. They can make outbound calls on behalf of the call queues or auto attendant that they are assigned to. And they can review the call queue statistics and seamlessly collaborate with their lead and colleagues within the flow of work. Authorized users, with permissions from Teams admins, can monitor their call queues and auto attendants in realtime, generate reports on queue and agent performance, configure their call queues and auto attendants using Teams settings, and opt in or out their team members to optimize for business needs. This is a Teams Premium feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Cloud egress groups (macOS)
CurrentVersion.description: Restrict sensitive files that match your policies from being shared with unrestricted cloud service domains. Restrict the use of specified web browsers, identified by their executable names. The specified browsers are blocked from accessing files that match the conditions of an enforced a DLP policy where the upload-to-cloud services restriction is set to block or block override.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Revamped Resources on mobile and tablet
CurrentVersion.description: The Resources section on Viva Connections mobile and tablet will show content from the recently revamped Resources section on Viva Connections desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can help you create draft quizzes
CurrentVersion.description: To help teachers, staff, and information workers save time, Copilot in Forms can now generate ice breakers, fun trivia, quizzes, and assessments with correct answers, which helps users focus more on engagement and interaction with their audience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can generate quizzes from provided materials
CurrentVersion.description: Generating quizzes from provided materials is one of the most commonly requested features in the education industry, and it is now available in Forms. To save time, users can create quizzes from documents, textbooks, or notes using Copilot. Copilot can create draft quizzes based on the provided materials and users' prompts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals Graph API's
CurrentVersion.description: The Approvals Graph APIs allows developers to create and manage Approvals from any application. This set of APIs allows users to integrate Approvals with line of business application and automate creation and updates of approvals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: View only mode in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Engage admins will have the ability to change users' access to view only mode. In view only mode, users can access and view content in Engage, but cannot comment, react, or create new posts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Teams Q&A to collect attendee questions in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Q&A enhances meeting and webinar participation for attendees by allowing participants to submit questions and engage in discussions. Organizers can moderate the Q&A feed, highlight important questions, and provide live answers. This feature is ideal for structured meetings and events, promoting an interactive and inclusive environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage change log for leaders and audiences identified
CurrentVersion.description: Admins and corporate communicators will be able to see any leaders who were added or removed in Viva Engage, as well as any audiences and removed from a leader in Viva Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Compliance boundary cmdlet tool for managing compliance boundary property
CurrentVersion.description: This cmdlet allows users to verify the compliance boundary property of a specific OneDrive site, ensuring that the value is correctly configured. If the property is not set or if the site is in arbitration, users can use this cmdlet to assign the property value for the site for compliance boundary to take effect.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voting, Filtering, Sorting, and Archiving Questions now available in the Q&A App on Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Take your Q&A to the next level with this new update that lets attendees vote on the questions they want presenters to answer. Organizers can sort questions by most voted, filter, and archive questions to keep the discussion focused in meetings and events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams premium feature usage report for administrators in Teams admin center (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Premium feature usage report in the Microsoft Teams admin center (TAC) will help administrators understand the usage of various Teams Premium features across users in their organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights Copilot Dashboard delegation
CurrentVersion.description: Users can delegate access to the Copilot Dashboard to others within their company. Admins can set policies to manage access to the delegation feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Turn On/Off notifications for a post
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to opt in/opt-out from receiving notifications for a post in a channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Sensitivity label support for town hall and webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will now allow event organizers to set sensitivity labels for town halls and webinars. These labels are visible to organizers when creating an event instance once selected, and notify organizers if the details of the event being created are not valid for the selected sensitivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: External presenters can join on mobile
CurrentVersion.description: This update allows presenters who were invited using the external presenter feature to join via their Android and iOS Teams client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Bulk upload for Priority User Groups
CurrentVersion.description: Insider Risk Management Priority user groups will now support bulk upload capabilities.  An IRM administrator will be able to upload a CSV of UPNs that they would like to add to a new or existing priority user group. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. The alert will be reviewed by a policy investigator, who is explicitly granted permission to review policy alerts by the Communication Compliance admin role. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-investigate-remediate?view=o365-worldwide
